name: SkeleButsu
description:
Play as a Skeleton with horns wearing boots 
what? The game is susposed to be hard
no idea how hard it is for others

The game must be hard , dying is quick,dying and errors just make you better at the game. (yep kinda lame for the theme,i am just letting the player improve his skills
by trail and error)

also the music is from https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/

if you have problems with pressing shift use O
